Lenovo ThinkPad is a Windows 10 laptop with a 14.00-inch display that has a resolution of 1920x1080 pixels. It is powered by a Core i7 processor and it comes with 12GB of RAM. The Lenovo ThinkPad packs 256GB of SSD storage.
Graphics are powered by Intel HD Graphics 520. Connectivity options include Wi-Fi 802.11 ac, Bluetooth and it comes with 3 USB ports ports.As of 1ast March 2020, Lenovo ThinkPad price in Bangladesh starts at BDT 70,000/=
